description: End your festive feast on a high with a doughnut Christmas tree. This easy dessert is ready in 15 minutes and delivers maximum wow-factor.
name: Doughnut Christmas Tree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the vanilla buttercream, using an electric mixer, beat butter on medium speed in a large bowl until pale and creamy. Reduce speed to low and gradually add icing sugar, beating well between additions. Add vanilla and beat on high speed for 2 minutes or until light and creamy.
Using the picture as a guide, assemble tree by layering donuts and vanilla buttercream.
Scatter over strawberries and serve drizzled with caramel.
